statements: SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE ANY child IN children SATISFIES child.age > 14 AND child.gender = "m" END order by name
SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE ANY child in children satisfies child.age > 14 END order by name
SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE ANY child IN children SATISFIES child.age > 14 END AND ANY hobby in hobbies SATISFIES hobby = "golf" END ORDER BY name
SELECT title FROM default:catalog WHERE ANY director IN details.director satisfies director END ORDER BY title
SELECT details.director FROM default:catalog GROUP BY details.director HAVING ANY director IN details.director satisfies director END ORDER BY details.director
SELECT asin FROM default:catalog WHERE dimensions.height > 1 and ANY gen IN details.genre satisfies gen = "Thriller" END ORDER BY asin DESC
SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE ANY child in children satisfies child.age > 14 END

description: ANY expression referring to outer context
statements: SELECT name, children FROM default:contacts WHERE ANY child in children satisfies child.name > name END
